# Grain Versioning Docs

- [Backward compatibility guidelines](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/grains/grain-versioning/backward-compatibility-guidelines.md): Learn the backward compatibility guidelines in .NET Orleans.
- [Compatible grains](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/grains/grain-versioning/compatible-grains.md): Learn about compatible grains in .NET Orleans.
- [Deploy new version of grains](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/grains/grain-versioning/deploying-new-versions-of-grains.md): Learn how to deploy new versions of grains in .NET Orleans.
- [Grain interface versioning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/grains/grain-versioning/grain-versioning.md): Learn how to use grain interface versioning in .NET Orleans.
- [Version selector strategy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/grains/grain-versioning/version-selector-strategy.md): Learn how to use the version selector strategy in .NET Orleans.
